q1.name: Gleaming Quill
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rakan''' slings an enchanted feather in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit.
If the target was an enemy {{tip|champion}} or {{tip|monster|epic monster}}, an area is marked around '''Rakan'''.

After 3 seconds or if an ally champion comes within the marked area, '''Rakan''' {{tip|heals}} himself and surrounding allies for {{passive progression/deprecated version|18 to 120}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit.If the target was an enemy champion or epic monster, an area is marked around Rakan.After 3 seconds or if an ally champion comes within the marked area, Rakan heals himself and surrounding allies for Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 18 to 120 (+ 70% AP).
q1.notes:
* The trigger radius is slightly smaller than the heal radius.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the marked area from being formed.
* The heal can activate immediately after the projectile hits the target, before the healing return animation completes.
* ''Gleaming Quill'' will cast from wherever '''Rakan''' is at the end of the cast time.
* The heal will trigger and affect '''Rakan''' even if he is {{tip|untargetable}}.
** {{Pending for test}}: Allies
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|12 to 8}}|Starts once the projectile vanishes}}' as '12/11/10/9/8' and riot's value '0,0,0,0,0' as '0'

w1.name: Grand Entrance
description: After a {{fd|0.35}}-second delay upon arrival, he leaps into the air, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} surrounding enemies for 1 second.
'''''Rakan''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control during Grand Entrance.''
''Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Rakan dashes to the target location.After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he leaps into the air, dealing magic damage and knocking up surrounding enemies for 1 second.Rakan will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during Grand Entrance.Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

r1.name: The Quickness
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rakan''' breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|75% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and becoming {{tip|ghosted}} for the duration. During this time he deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemy units he collides with, in addition to {{tip|charm|charming}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 75%. Colliding with an enemy {{tip|champion}} increases ''The Quickness' '' duration by {{fd|0.25}} seconds. This may only occur once per champion.

When '''Rakan''' collides with his first enemy {{tip|champion}} he gains an additional {{sti|ms|{{as|75% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, which starts decaying after {{fd|0.5}} seconds by 20% every {{fd|0.5}} seconds and then by 15% after decaying by 60% over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
During the first {{fd|0.5}} seconds of ''The Quickness'', '''Rakan''' is in [[Channel#Casting_Times|cast time]].
''During The Quickness, '''Rakan''' cannot [[basic attack]] enemy champions if he did not charm them, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.''
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining 75% bonus movement speed and becoming ghosted for the duration. During this time he deals magic damage to all enemy units he collides with, in addition to charming and slowing them by 75%. Colliding with an enemy champion increases The Quickness' duration by 0.25 seconds. This may only occur once per champion.When Rakan collides with his first enemy champion he gains an additional 75% bonus movement speed, which starts decaying after 0.5 seconds by 20% every 0.5 seconds and then by 15% after decaying by 60% over 1.5 seconds.During the first 0.5 seconds of The Quickness, Rakan is in Channel#Casting_Times.During The Quickness, Rakan cannot basic attack enemy champions if he did not charm them, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.
